 Luzbel/Attilla::
The lava defences had started to go down while attilla and  Luzbel with their guest arrived to the end of the tunnel that lead to BlackFortress, soon the door would be opened
  aerosmith60@... wrote: Galvatron's head clicked. he looked aver at the scanners. yes they had yet 
to get to thier base. He sent a comm to panzer. Silent and coded to ehr spark 
so only she would hear it. "Dont move. But help is on the way cat. You must 
try and escape. When the bot placed the bomb on your leg a saftey device 
should still remain there. Click it and and it will make a  bright flash. It 
should blind them. Then you must run as far away as you can. We will be there 
shortly to pick you up." He yelled at Dark Mouse. "lets move we have a chance 
to grab this cat after all." He opened the door. God neptune came out and 
flew off towards the cat's signal he blasted off too. He sent a comm to 
shredder. "meet me at this cat bots coordinates hurry!" They where on there 
way. he only hoped the cat would listen.
